author: National Zero
title: Ground News - Iowa college cancels Trump town hall - National Zero
text:
Summary by National Zero Dordt University, an evangelical Christian college with 1,500 students in Sioux Center, Iowa, announced it was canceling a town hall with Republican presidential candidate and multi-venue defendant Donald Trump because Trump insisted on hosting a rally at the campus and didn’t want to take questions from students, KCAU ABC-9 in Sioux City reports. In a statement, the university said it would no longer host the event at a campus location that hol… Share menu More
